entities.name: bludgers
entities.description: The Bludgers are flying objects that try to knock players off their brooms. They are described as 'flying around' and trying to hit the players.

entities.name: weasley twins
entities.description: The Weasley twins are two Beaters on Harry's team who protect their side from the Bludgers and try to knock them towards the other team.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The Quaffle is a ball that three Chasers try to score with.

entities.name: beaters
entities.description: The Beaters keep the Bludgers away from their team.

entities.name: chasers
entities.description: Three Chasers try to score with the Quaffle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the Seeker on his team.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is the teacher who explains the rules of Quidditch to Harry.

relationships.description: The Weasley twins protect their side from the Bludgers.
The Beaters keep the Bludgers away from their team.
Three Chasers try to score with the Quaffle.
Harry does not have to worry about the Quaffle as a Seeker.
Harry does not have to worry about the Bludgers as a Seeker.
